reviewText: As an Addictions Counselor, I use this video w/ adolescents frequently to show the dangers of drinking and driving. It is sometimes difficult to keep adolescents attention, but this video does a good job!

This video is about teens/drinking/driving where the end result is head trauma that affects the teenagers for the rest of their lives.  It is hard to watch sometimes but high school kids definitely get the point.
I purchased this for our treatment program for Youth. It is excellent! Just what we needed for treatment materials. Terri
